snippet: Chase Austin will have a chance to become the third African-American driver to compete in the Indianapolis 500 after being selected by A. J. Foyt to drive his entry in the 2013 event.
abstract: Nascar's Chase Austin will have a chance to become the third African-American driver to compete in the Indianapolis 500 after being selected by A J Foyt to drive his entry in the 2013 event.
lead_paragraph: Chase Austin will have a chance to become the third African-American driver to compete in the Indianapolis 500 after being selected by A. J. Foyt to drive his entry in the 2013 event.
